message: Hi Bob, I think a 50-50 split is fair for both of us. This way we both get an equal amount of the money.
Hi Alice, considering the inflation effect on my side, I'd like to propose a 55-45 split. This way, I can secure a bit more value from the deal.

Hi Bob, I understand your concern about inflation affecting your side. However, since you face 5% inflation per round, a fair adjustment would be to give you slightly less than 50% in absolute dollars so we both end up with roughly equal value. With 4800, at 5% inflation, it's worth 4560 to you, which is close to what you offered me. This is more fair than your previous proposal.
